result.arabic_text: ذَٰلِكَ لِيَعۡلَمَ أَنِّي لَمۡ أَخُنۡهُ بِٱلۡغَيۡبِ وَأَنَّ ٱللَّهَ لَا يَهۡدِي كَيۡدَ ٱلۡخَآئِنِينَ
result.translation: 52. Nabii Yuusuf anu tama amoyti ruube farmoyta kah gacsem qaziiz anu wohuk bari kinniyooh kaak derrel kay barral kaa gane weem yaaxigenkeh iyyaanama, diggah Yalli ganoleelâ keydii kee malmaalu arac maxagsaay faxeenim keenil ma bicsa iyye.
